content: also available at favecrafts com 1 as blue bunny 1 http //www favecrafts com/crochet-amigurumi/blue-bunny finished measurements bunny measures approximately 21 /53 5cm tall from head to toe or 10 /25 5cm tall seated materials caron international one pound 100% acrylic 16 oz/454 g 812 yds/742 m skein one skein shown in 508 sky blue one size us g-6 4mm crochet hook or size to obtain gauge stitch marker two safety eyes 18mm diameter or buttons polyester fiberfill scraps of pink yarn for nose and brown yarn for mouth yarn needle gauge gauge is not critical for this project work tightly to ensure that the stuffing will not show through the stitches stitches used chain chain double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet single_crochet
